titles.title: Tax Refund Statute of Limitation Extension Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the period for filing for a credit or refund of individual income taxes to 7 years.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/8/2003--Introduced. Tax Refund Statute of Limitation Extension Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend to seven years the filing period for individual income tax refunds or credits.
